text: @NYGovCuomo Can you say, way too little way to late? Sitting there today and playing  "per capita" games with the lives of over 5000 elderly and sick, who you pushed the infected on is even low for you. .@MalzbergShow #nursinghomes #coronavirus #GovernorAndrewCuomo @mgoodwin_nypost
